episodes.title: OVA: Regards
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Jean the Cigarette-Peddler
episodes.plot: The kingdom of Dowa is subdivided into 13 states. These 13 states have many agencies that are controlled by the giant organization known as ACCA. Within ACCA, Jean Otus is the second-in-command of the inspection agency, and he has business trips from the capital to the other districts to check on the situation. One day, Five Secretaries of ACCA decide to abolish the inspection agency.

episodes.title: The Partner in Crime's Name Is Nino
episodes.plot: Jean feels like that someone has watched him recently. He asks his best friend Nino who is a freelance journalist to investigate the problem. Meanwhile, Five Secretaries hear rumors that someone makes a coup attempt.

episodes.title: The Swirling Smoke of Rumors in the Castle
episodes.plot: The ACCA director Mauve make an approach to Jean for cooperation secretly to gather coup information. Meanwhile, Prince Schwan also hears rumors about a coup attempt.

episodes.title: Smoldering Embers in an Isolated Nation
episodes.plot: Jean visits an inspection of Suitsu ward. In Suitsu ward, the nobility has forced to restrict exchanges between the inhabitants and the outside because they respect too much for their tradition and formality. The inhabitants have been stressed out, even Jean feels stuffy atmosphere in this ward as a outsider.

episodes.title: Overlapping Footprints in the Distance
episodes.plot: One of Five Secretaries Lilium informed Jean that someone has watched him. And then Jean learns a truth when he heads to Birra ward for his business.

episodes.title: Where Pride and Train Tracks Lead
episodes.plot: Jean visits an inspection of Rokkusu ward. He meets one of Five Secretaries Grossular who is home in holidays. Jean tells honest his feelings about the coup and himself to Grossular.

episodes.title: The Truth Emerges in the Night Mists
episodes.plot: Jean visited an inspection of Dowa ward where the royal family lives in. Jean goes out to the downtown to buy some presents for his sister Lotta after he finished his business. That day is a day the king Falke II goes for a walk incognito in downtown, there are some guards on that street.

episodes.title: The Princess Who Spread Her Wings and the Friend Who Had a Duty
episodes.plot: Nino made up his mind to tell Jean the truth. It's a very long story that started 33 years ago.

episodes.title: A Graceful Black Adder Bears Its Fangs
episodes.plot: While Jean is away home at work for a long time, some suspicious men appear around Lotta. Maggie gets that information, and gets in touch with Rail to protect her.

episodes.title: Starfall in a City Without a Sky
episodes.plot: Jean visits Yakkara ward and Puranetta ward for the inspection. Both of two wards have its own prospect for the future are very different, so these things make him think a lot.

episodes.title: Furawau's Flowers Smell of Malice
episodes.plot: Jean visits Furawau ward, he receives too much warm hospitality by Lyrium's brothers who are in important positions. Furawau ward looks like a paradise, but somehow he cannot help feeling uncomfortable.

episodes.title: Where the Bird Flies
episodes.plot: The day of ceremony to commemorate the 100th anniversary of establishment of ACCA, the square in front of the Bãdon ward office is filled with a lot of citizens. Then the plan that decides the destiny of the kingdom of Dowa is starting now.
